mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (patientId, doctorId, patientName, sex, age, phone, oldHistory, allergiesHistory, habits, description, tongue) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{patientName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{oldHistory}, #{allergiesHistory}, #{habits}, #{description}, #{tongue})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM record r LEFT JOIN doctor d ON r.doctorId = d.doctorId WHERE recordId=#{recordId}
mapper.update: update record set status=#{status}, score=#{score} where recordId=#{recordId};
